analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the implementation or revival of “Schedule F” for federal employees. This proposal undermines the merit-based civil service system established by the Pendleton Act and threatens the apolitical integrity of our federal workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, citing concerns about undermining the merit-based civil service system and due process protections, which aligns with the indicators of opposition to the rule.
